title: Office 2025 USB Bundle Compatible with Microsoft Office 2024 2021 365 for Home & Student Family & Personal Use Powered by Apache OpenOffice & LibreOffice for Windows PC 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP & Mac
description: these premier yet affordable office suites are provided on two USBs that include word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, graphics, databases and more.
is a word processor you can use for anything from writing a quick letter to producing an entire book.
is a powerful spreadsheet with all the tools you need to calculate, analyse, and present your data in numerical reports or sizzling graphics.
is the fastest, most powerful way to create effective and professional multimedia presentations.
lets you produce everything from simple diagrams to dynamic 3D illustrations.
enables you to manipulate databases seamlessly. Create and modify tables, forms, queries, and reports, all from within.
lets you create mathematical equations with a graphic user interface or by directly typing your formulas into the equation editor.

exclusive extras include 1500 fonts, more than 120 professional templates, PDF user guides, 40+ language packs, and a gallery pack consisting of 1000's of clip art images for Writer, Calc and Impress.
, leaving you free to create without the worry for the need of expensive new versions, as can be the case with other suites.
compatible with Microsoft Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP 32 and 64-bit PC, macOS, and Mac OS X.
